titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to index for inflation the exemption amount for individuals under the alternative minimum tax and to repeal the alternative minimum tax on individuals in 2010.

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to index for inflation the exemption amount for individuals under the alternative minimum tax and to repeal the alternative minimum tax on individuals in 2010.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) index for inflation the exemption amounts for the alternative minimum tax applicable to individual taxpayers; and (2) repeal such tax for individual taxpayers in 2010.
